s.text: If you would like a copy before you leave home, write to: The Budapest Sun, 1068 Budapest, D—zsa Gyšrgy œt 84a.
Out of town, Lake Balaton is a good place for water babies, particularly the southern edge where the sandy shore slopes gently into warm water.
For a relatively small nation, Hungary has enjoyed much Olympic and World Championship success.
